snippet: House Speaker John A. Boehner said Wednesday he is ready to accept a budget deal that raises federal revenues if it is linked to an overhaul of entitlements and the tax code.

byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN and JACKIE CALMES
byline.contributor: Jonathan Weisman and John H. Cushman Jr. contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: House Speaker John A. Boehner said Wednesday he is ready to accept a budget deal that raises federal revenues if it is linked to an overhaul of entitlements and the tax code.

headline.seo: Boehner Strikes Conciliatory Tone in Talk of Fiscal Cliff
headline.main: Boehner Strikes Conciliatory Tone in Talk of Fiscal Cliff
headline.print_headline: Back to Bargaining Table, With Fiscal Cliff Dead Ahead
